In England, in the seven days to 13 March, there were 32,793 new confirmed cases (58.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 March, there were 34,020 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (1,227 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 March is 3,746,280 (6,655.7 cases per 100,000 population).
